flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of mangoes, pears and pawpaws is 18+10+12 = <<18+10+12=40>>40
The total number of fruits is 58 so the last two baskets contain 58-40 = <<58-40=14>>14 fruits
Each of the last two baskets contains an equal amount of fruits which is 14/2 = <<14/2=7>>7 fruits
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
